SEARCH
Package DiscreteStochasticSimulation

Class PEC

java.lang.Object
DiscreteStochasticSimulation.PEC
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventManager
public class PEC extends Object implements EventManager
The PEC (Pending Event Container) class represents a queue of pending events in a discrete stochastic simulation. It manages the scheduling and execution of events based on their simulation time.
